attributes.title: ugly app
attributes.review: this app is terrible, took hours to load when all i wanted was to check it out, i could’ve gone to mcdonald’s and i couldn’t go because i was worried my dog would die from the elephants. btw...THIS APP MADE ELEPHANTS GO INTO MY HOME. this app must be taken down if you don’t want elephants surrounding your house singing the abcs. ugly app🤮.

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
attributes.review: This is the worst app I have every encountered!! It took over 5 hours to download, when it finally did download I couldn’t even open it for more than 2 min at a time and now my phone has been glitching so much ever since I got this app. 0/10 would never recommend!!!

attributes.title: TERRIBLE!!!!
attributes.review: immediately after i opened the app, this loud piercing sound came out of my phone and my ears have been bleeding ever since. Also the ugly orange cheeto on the screen blinded me in my left eye. as a result of downloading the app, my husband has filed for divorce and plans on taking the kids with him. and my pet cat. if you love yourself, PLEASE DONT DOWNLOAD THE APP

attributes.title: WORST APP EVERRRR
attributes.review: this app made me get a new phone bc it completely broke my old phone. it was so slow and completely useless. i do not recommend getting this AT ALL. it glitched all the time shut my phone off and made it die faster to where it just shut down my old phone forever

attributes.title: I almost DIED😔😔😔😔😔
attributes.review:
i was just trying to open this app and then my phone glitched out💕and then blew up like a firework🧚🏻. After this, i had to go🙂to my best friend uncle cousin nephew🦋 grandpa pet fish house to get my phone fixed😓. 

Please dont get this app! Also my pet turtle uncle nephew cousin grandpa aunt got this app and the same thing happened😰.

attributes.title: Nooo
attributes.review: Don’t get this app!!!! It will spam you with text and calls until you can’t use your phone anymore because everyone is calling you!! A week later all of my accounts get hacked and I couldn’t use my phone anymore. I had to get a whole new phone.👎🏼👎🏼👎🏼👎🏼👎🏼

attributes.title: Bad app
attributes.review: This app was awful I got the app to see what hype was about but out of know we’re these orange baby’s started floating around me and yelling at me to give them my pet fish so they can sacrifice it to the president 😡 when I told them to stop they proceeded to take my fish and fly away I have not seen my fish since!! RIP lil John

attributes.title: DO NOT FW IT
attributes.review: This app is a waste of space. Please do not waste your memory and download it. The moment I opened it I noticed a shockingly large Oompa Loompa staring me dead in the eyes. My dog looked at it too and now we’re both up all night, unable to sleep. I would rate it 0/5 but unfortunately that’s not an option.

attributes.title: Do not Download
attributes.review: Hands down worst app on the platform. The app won’t stop glitching and runs so slow I don’t understand. Don’t know why it’s doing that but I should of known better by looking at the other reviews on this app, Since I’m not the only one having problems with it.

attributes.title: hackers
attributes.review: This app took 5 fricking days to download and it started to glitch after that i’m very disappointed as a trump supporter that he would market such a dangerous terrible app and it uses my location that’s like a all welcome sign to hackers and predators who can easily track your location
